mapper.select: SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.REVIEW_NO DESC) RNUM, A.REVIEW_NO, A.ITEM_NO as aITEM_NO, A.REVIEW_MEM_ID , (SELECT MAX(D.MEM_NM) FROM MEMBER D WHERE D.MEM_ID = A.REVIEW_MEM_ID) MEM_NM , A.REVIEW_CNSLTNT_ID , (SELECT MAX(C.MEM_NM) FROM MEMBER C WHERE C.MEM_ID = A.REVIEW_CNSLTNT_ID) CON_NM , A.REVIEW_RATE, A.REVIEW_CNTNT, A.REVIEW_REG_DT , B.ITEM_NO as bITEM_NO , B.ITEM_NM , B.ITEM_INTRCN FROM CONSULTANT_REVIEW A, ITEM B WHERE A.ITEM_NO = B.ITEM_NO AND A.REVIEW_MEM_ID = #{memId} )T WHERE T.RNUM BETWEEN (#{currentPage} * #{size}) - (#{size} - 1) and (#{currentPage} * #{size})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CONSULTANT_REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_CNSLTNT_ID = #{memId}

SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REVIEW_REG_DT DESC) RNUM, REVIEW_NO, ITEM_NO, REVIEW_MEM_ID, REVIEW_CNSLTNT_ID, REVIEW_RATE, REVIEW_CNTNT, REVIEW_REG_DT FROM CONSULTANT_REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_CNSLTNT_ID = #{memId} ) T WHERE T.RNUM BETWEEN (#{currentPage} * #{size}) - (#{size} - 1) and (#{currentPage} * #{size})
